name: IRCTC
description: An API with various functionalities for Indian railways IRCTC API. We are not affiliated with Indian railways IRCTC in any form, and this is not an official API, but all the results are real-time and accurate. You can get in touch with us at https://t.me/rapidapisupport. For payment related inquiries, APIs and customised plans.

utterances.utterance: Check seat availability for train number 12045 from New Delhi (NDLS) to Mumbai Central (BCT) on 2023-12-15 in AC 2-tier class under general quota.
Find available seats for train 12951 from Ahmedabad (ADI) to Jaipur (JP) on 2023-11-20 in sleeper class under tatkal quota.

Verify seat availability for train 12266 from Howrah (HWH) to Patna (PNBE) on 2023-09-30 in second seating class under ladies quota.
Check for available seats on train 11077 from Pune (PUNE) to Mumbai CST (CSTM) on 2023-08-15 in first class under general quota.
Find seat availability for train 12859 from Bhubaneswar (BBS) to Kolkata (KOAA) on 2023-07-10 in AC chair car class under tatkal quota.
Check if seats are available on train 12779 from Hyderabad (HYB) to Vijayawada (BZA) on 2023-06-05 in sleeper class under general quota.
Verify seat availability for train 12431 from Jammu Tawi (JAT) to Delhi (NDLS) on 2023-05-01 in AC first class under tatkal quota.
Check for available seats on train 12649 from Trivandrum (TVC) to Chennai Central (MAS) on 2023-04-15 in AC 2-tier class under general quota.
Find seat availability for train 12903 from Jaipur (JP) to Mumbai Central (BCT) on 2023-03-10 in AC 3-tier class under ladies quota.

api_methods.name: Get Train Live Status
api_methods.description: This API will take train no and day of journey, and will return current status of train with other informations.

parameters.name: startDay
parameters.description:
Optional File
start day range from 0-4
0 = Day 1
1 = 1 Day Ago
2 = 2 Day Ago
3 = 3 Day Ago
4 = 4 Day Ago
